caughtFishDespawnTimer.description: (Required: Caught Fish Despawns Toggle) Number of seconds before the fish despawns after being reeled. Note: Putting string instead of number just returns the default value
caughtFishDespawnTimer.name: yn:fishing_got_reel.configuration.server.caught_fish_despawn_timer

expirationTimer.description: Number of seconds before cancelling the fishing system. Note: Putting string instead of number just returns the default value
expirationTimer.name: yn:fishing_got_reel.configuration.server.expiration_timer

CatchingPlacement.description: The locator for when will be caught entity be placed or reeled
CatchingPlacement.name: yn:fishing_got_reel.configuration.server.caught_direction

caughtFishDespawns.description: Makes the caught fish despawn after an x amount of seconds being reeled-in.
caughtFishDespawns.name: yn:fishing_got_reel.configuration.server.does_caught_fish_despawn

ShowMessageUponJoin.description: Shows the script initialization message log upon player joining, default is true.
ShowMessageUponJoin.name: yn:fishing_got_reel.configuration.server.show_message_on_join
